Villa Alemana is a community located in the province of Marga Marga, in the Valparaíso region in the central part of Chile. It is known as the "city of the mills", because of the large number of country homes that need to get water by means of mills. It is also known as the "City of Eternal Youth", for its temperate and pleasant climate, which is reflected in the following saying: " because of its climate, the young people are not afraid to grow old. The old people in Villa Alemana live in eternal youth."

The name “Villa Alemana” (German Villa) is due to the fact that German immigrants were the first to buy places and establish themselves in this territory.

loans.use: to buy flowers to stock her business.

loans.name: Jenny Maglody

texts.es:
A sus 22 años de edad Jenny es una emprendedora que decidió crear su propio negocio como una forma de ayudarle a su familia con los gastos económicos, ella vende helados y granizados a los habitantes de su comunidad, sin embargo apenas está en sus comienzos y necesita un préstamo con el cual comprar insumos que faciliten la producción y una máquina especial para hacer granizados.
 
Sueña con tener un negocio grande que le genere buenos ingresos para así brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
At her 22 years of age Jenny is an entrepreneur who decided to create her own business.  She did this as a way to help her family with the expenses.  

She sells ice cream and snow cones to the people who live in her community.  However, she is just starting; and she needs a loan.  She will use the loan to buy supplies that facilitate production, and she will buy a special machine to make the snow cones.

She dreams of having a large business that generates good income.  That way she will give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a machine to make snow cones.

loans.name: Jaime Marcelo

texts.es:
Jaime es un hombre de 35 años, tiene 4 hijos de 16-14-12 y 10 años de edad, dos de ellos están en el colegio y dos en la escuela. Vive en la parroquia "Abrahan Calazacon" de la ciudad de "Santo Domingo". 

Santo Domingo  "donde la patria se encuentra" es una ciudad dinámica y acogedora perteneciente a la provincia de "Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas". En esta tierra habitan ciudadanos de todos los rincones del Ecuador, lo que la hace diversa y emprendedora y esa es precisamente su identidad. Se encuentra en una zona climática lluviosa subtropical, teniendo una temperatura promedio de 22,9°C . Por su ubicación geográfica, tiene un comercio muy activo ya que se ha convertido en un puerto terrestre de intercambio entre sierra y costa. La actividad más importante es la ganadera, pues es aquí es en donde se desarrolla el mayor mercado ganadero del Ecuador. Por encontrarse en una zona tropical y estar limitado por una rama de la cordillera de Los Andes existe una alta biodiversidad y pisos ecológicos que crean una variedad infinita de ecosistemas.

Jaime tiene una microempresa dedicada a la producción de productos lácteos desde hace 6 años, como todo negocio ha tenido sus altos y bajos, pero nos cuenta que todos los obstáculos han sido superados con perseverancia. El desea invertir en su empresa, esto ya que quiere expandir su mercado a zonas aledañas. Es su segundo crédito en Fundación Alternativa y es considerado un buen cliente.

Sueña con tener una empresa grande, que de trabajo a muchas personas, sueña también con construir un gran edificio y por ello diariamente se esfuerza, para alcanzar sus metas.
texts.en:
Jaime is a 35 year old man who has four children, ages 16, 14, 12, and 10.  Two of them are in high school and two are in elementary school.  He lives in the Abrahan Calazacon parish in the city of Santo Domingo.  Santa Domingo, “donde la patria se encuentra” (where the homeland is found) is a dynamic and hospitable city, which belongs to the Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas province.

People from every corner of Ecuador live on this land.  This makes it diverse and entrepreneurial, and that is precisely its identity.  It is located in a rainy, subtropical climate zone.  The average temperature is 22.9° Celcius.  Due to its geographical location, commerce is very active.  It has been converted into an onshore port of exchange between the coast and highlands.  The most important business activity is livestock.  This is where the biggest livestock market in Ecuador thrives. Because it is in a tropical zone and limited by part of the Andes mountain range, there exists a lot of biodiversity and ecological zones that create an infinite variety of ecosystems.

Jaime is a small businessman who has been making dairy products for six years.  Like all businesses, it has had its highs and lows.  However, he tells us that with perseverance he has overcome all of the obstacles.  He wishes to invest in his business because he wants to expand his market to nearby zones.

This is his second loan with Fundación Alternativa, and he is considered to be a good client.  

He dreams of having a large company that gives work to a lot of people.  He also dreams of building a large building.  Therefore, he works hard every day in order to achieve his goals.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for his small business in order to make dairy products.

loans.name: Carlos Alberto

texts.es:
A sus 35 años Carlos es un luchador que debido a la mala situación económica que enfrentaba su familia decidió independizarse y tener su propio negocio, donde vende ropa de gran variedad para hombres y mujeres, trabaja todos los días ofreciendo estos productos a viejos y nuevos clientes.
 
Actualmente Carlos responde económicamente por su familia y día a día trabaja con la ilusión de brindarles una mejor calidad de vida, lo que lo ha motivado a salir adelante, sin embargo hoy en día Carlos solicita un préstamo que le permita surtir su negocio generosamente y así no sólo atraer más clientes gracias a la cantidad, y variedad de productos si no también que lo diferencie de otros vendedores que hay en el sector gracias a la calidad en el servicio. Sueña con tener un almacén que le genere ingresos más estables, que le brinde a él y su familia la tranquilidad de tener estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
Thirty-five year old Carlos is a fighter who, due to the poor economic situtation that faced his family, decided to become independent and start his own business where he sells a variety of mens and womens clothing. He works everyday to sell these products to old and new customers.

Carlos is currently responsible for the finances of his family and he works day after day in the hope of providing them with a better quality of life, something which has motivated him to get ahead. However, Carlos is now requesting a loan which will allow him to generously stock his business. This will not only attact more customers thanks to the quantity and variety of his goods, but the quality of his service will also set him apart from the other vendors in the sector.

He dreams of having a store that will generate a steadier income, in turn providing him and his family with the peace of mind of being financially secure.

loans.use: to buy wholesale merchandise to stock his business

loans.name: Maria Candelaria

texts.es:
La señora Maria tiene 55 años D. edad, es madre soltera D. 5 hijos.

Ella se ha dedicado a la agricultura desD. hace 31 años, su papá fue quien le enseño este trabajo. La señora Maria se levanta todos los días junto con sus hijos a las 3:00 D. la mañana a darles D. comer a sus animales, para luego ir a trabajar durante 8 horas a sus cultivos que quedan a una distancia D. seis kilómetros D. donD. ella vive.

Para tener una buena cosecha, ella debe D. comprar insumos como fertilizantes, por lo que debe trasportarse a la ciudad en busca D. ellos. Para esto debe caminar a pie un kilómetro hasta la carretera principal y luego se desplaza en bus hasta la ciudad donD. adquiere sus fertilizantes.

Ella utilizará el préstamo para la compra D. fertilizantes, herbicidas y fungicidas, lo que le permitirá aplicarle los nutrientes necesarios a su cultivo D. maíz y poder obtener una buena cosecha. Esto le permitirá cubrir sus obligaciones crediticias y las necesidades D. su hogar.

Con los ingresos generados a partir D. la venta del maíz, ella tendrá la oportunidad D. volver a sembrar y podrá reparar el techo y las paredes D. su casa. El techo es D. lámina D. metal, y está muy deteriorado. Las paredes son D. adobe y ya están dañadas.

A ella le gustaría en un futuro comprar más ganado del que ya posee, para la producción D. leche y D. esta manera venderla y tener otra fuente D. ingresos. Otra fuente D. ingresos le permitiría proveer una mejor calidad D. vida a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Maria is 55 years old. She is a single mother of 5 children.

She has been farming for 31 years. Her father taught her this work. Maria gets up every day with her children at 3 in the morning to feed her animals, and then goes to work for 8 hours on her crops, which are located six kilometers from where she lives.

In order to have a good harvest, she needs to buy supplies such as fertilizers, and she must travel to the city in search of them. For this, she must walk one kilometer to the main highway and then travel on a bus to the city where she buys her fertilizers.

She will use the loan to purchase fertilizers, herbicides, and fungicides, which will allow her to apply the necessary nutrients to her corn crop and enable her to have a good harvest. This will allow her to meet her credit obligations and the needs of her household.

With the earnings generated from the sale of the corn, she will have the opportunity to plant again, and she will be able to repair the roof and walls of her house. The roof is sheet metal and is in very bad condition. The walls are adobe and are already damaged.

In the future, she would like to purchase more livestock than she currently has, in order to produce milk and sell it and have another source of income. Another source of income would allow her to proviD. her children with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers, herbicides, and fungicides for growing corn

loans.name: Amanecer Mercedes Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “AMANECER DE MERCEDES” iniciará su segundo ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Cascada, está compuesta por ocho integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la señora Luz Karina. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: venta de bisutería y juguetería, venta de medias, comerciante, tejido a macramé, tienda de barrio, artesanía, cerrajería, repostería.

La señora Luz Karina,  indica hace cinco meses que trabaja con Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitación de una promotora. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de respoteria o panadería que viene trabajando hace veinte y un años.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para aumentar su capital (compra de herramientas eléctricas para la panadería), que comprara de la Ceja y posteriormente la elaboración de sus productos los venderá a pedido. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar en lo posible a su familia, pues ella es soltera y tiene cuatro hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta sacar dinero rápido.

En la fotografía no aparese la señora Gloria, ya que se encuentra en consulta medica.
texts.en:
The “Amanecer de Mercedes” (Dawn of Mercy) communal bank is beginning its 2nd cycle of loans with Pro-Mujer (Pro-Woman), as part of the Centro Cascada (Cascade Center). The bank is composed of 8 members and is directed by a board headed by Luz Karina. The businesses pursued by members of the communal association are varied. Among them we have: selling costume jewelry and fruit juices, selling hose, a merchant, making macrame, a neighborhood store, making artisan crafts, a locksmith shop, and a confectioner's shop.

Luz Karina has been with Pro-Mujer for 5 months, having been invited by a promoter. At present, she has a confectioner's shop, or bakery, which she has operated for some 21 years.

The loan she now seeks is for buying electrical equipment from La Ceja for the bakery. With this she will bake her products and sell them by order. This form of work allows her to generate resources to help her family as much as possible, since she is single and has 4 children.

When asked what she likes about Pro-Mujer, Luz Karina said she likes the rapid access to funds.

In the photo, the member Gloria is not present due to a medical consultation.

loans.use: to buy electrical equipment for her bakery.

loans.name: Maria De Los Angeles

texts.es:
La señora Maria de los Angeles tiene 36 años de edad, vive en la Aldea el Papalon de la ciudad de San Lorenzo, ahi vive con sus 4 hijos y su esposo, quien se dedica a la venta de granos de maíz y plátanos.
Maria se dedica a la venta de productos de consumo diario, tiene una pulperia en su casa de habitacion, atiende a sus clientes de lunes a domingo, sus clientes son personas que trabajan en las compañias meloneras y cañeras.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de mercaderia de uso personal, desea tener mas surtido su negocio.

su meta es tener su negocio bien surtido para la navidad.
texts.en:
Maria de los Angeles is 36 years old, she lives in El Papalon, a community of the town of San Lorenzo. She lives there with her 4 children and her husband, who engages in selling maize grains and plantains.
Maria engages in selling everyday products. She runs a corner shop in her house, and she tends to her customers Mondays to Sundays. Her customers are employed by the melons and sugarcane farms.
The loan she is requesting will be used to buy personal use products, as she wishes to better supply her shop.

Her goal is to have her shop well stocked up by Christmas.

loans.use: To buy soap, condicioner, hair gel, baby oil, deodorants, skin and face creams, nail polishes, nail varnish removers, threads, safety pins and water.

loans.name: Natalia

texts.es:
La señora Natalia esta agradecida por su cooperación en los dos créditos anteriores los cuales ha invertido en su negocio. 
Esta solicitando un préstamo para invertir en un nuevo negocio de venta de productos de belleza en comprar (cosméticos, perfumes de dama y caballero) ya que no cuenta con el dinero necesario para la inversión, ya que sus clientes le solicitaron mas productos. 
Doña Natalia planea pagar el crédito con las ganancias que obtiene de su negocio, ya que los gastos familiares y escolares de su hija se encargara su esposo el señor Fernando quien trabaja como chofer de un camión de carga. 
Desea mejorar su negocio y tener mas ingreso a la familia, para ayudarle a su esposo en los gastos.
texts.en:
Natalia is grateful for your cooperation with her previous two loans, which she has invested in her business.

She is asking for a loan to invest in a new business selling beauty products (cosmetics, ladies' and gentlemen's perfumes), since she doesn't have the money necessary for the investment, and her clients are asking her for more products.

Natalia plans to pay back the loan with the earnings from her business, since family expenses and school expenses for her daughter will be the responsibility of her husband, Fernando, who works as a truck driver.

She wants to improve her business and earn more for her family, in order to help her husband with the expenses.

loans.use: to purchase beauty products for her business

loans.name: Maria Yamileth

texts.es:
La señora Maria Yamileth tiene 33 años de edad, vive en la comunidad de El Relleno Amapala, y se dedica a la venta de productos de consumo diario, tiene una pulperia en su casa de habitacion.
Maria antes de abrir su pulperia todos los dias hace una produccion de tortillas las cuales las manda a una finca camaronera, estas tortillas son por encargo todos los dias.
Maria vive con sus dos hijos y su esposo.
el creito lo utilizara para la compra de abarroteria, desea surtir su negocio.

Su deseo como persona es tener salud y que en su hogar reine la paz y el amor.
texts.en:
Maria Yamileth is 33 years old and she lives in the El Relleno Amapala community. She sells everyday products, and she runs a corner shop which is set in her house.
Every day, before opening her corner shop, Maria prepares tortillas that she then sends to a shrimp plant: these are tortillas she makes for order and she prepares every day.
Maria lives with her two children and her husband.
The loan she is requesting will be used to buy groceries, as she wants to stock up her shop.

Her personal desire is to be healthy and for peace and love to reign in her house.

loans.use: To buy beans, rice, sugar, milk, eggs, bread, biscuits, coffee, butter, oil, margarina, soups, pastas, oats, cereals, drinks, sugared almonds, batteries, candles, matches, chicken sausages, sopas, toothpaste, toilet paper and sanitary napkins.

loans.name: Las Inseparables Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “LAS INSEPARABLES” iniciará su primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Cascada, está compuesta por seis integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la señora Jeanete. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: Artesanías en mantas, comercio de golosinas, tienda, comercio.

La señora Luz Karina,  indica hace diez meses que trabaja con Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitación de una promotora. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de artesanía (tejido de mantas) que viene trabajando hace veinte años.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para aumentar su capital (compra de lana), que comprara de la Ceja y posteriormente la elaboración de sus productos los venderá en las ferias. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar en lo posible a su familia, pues ella es soltera y tiene tres hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta la capacitación, la atención y el seguro que ayuda a todas.

En la fotografia no aparese la señora Francisca,que por cultura no quizo participar en la misma.
texts.en:
The “Las Inseparables” community bank is about to start its first loan cycle with Pro Mujer, as part of the Cascada regional office.  The group has six members and is run by a board of directors which is led by Jeanete.  The businesses that the members of the community bank are engaged in are varied and include: handicrafts (blankets), selling candies, running a store and commerce.

Luz Karina tells us that she has been working with Pro Mujer for ten months.  She joined through an invitation from a loan officer.  She currently has a handicrafts business (knitting blankets) which she has had for twenty years.

Luz Karina will use this loan to increase her capital (buying yarn).  She will buy her yarn in La Ceja and then make her products which she will sell in the markets.  This work allows her to make money with which to support her family in so far as she is able.  She is single and has three children.

When we asked her what she likes about Pro Mujer, Luz Karina replied that she likes the training, the service and the insurance that helps everybody.

Francisca is not present in the photo.  She did not want to be photographed for cultural reasons.

loans.use: to buy yarn

loans.name: Liseth

texts.es: A sus 28 años de edad y como madre de 2 hijos Liseth es una mujer emprendedora que se despierta día a día con la ilusión de sacar a sus hijos adelante, ella trabaja desde su casa arreglando unas de manos y pies a sus vecinos y allegados. Esta labor la realiza desde hace 8 años y se siente afortunada por tener un negocio donde pueda estar al pendiente de sus hijos, sueña con tener una sala de belleza que le genere mas estabilidad económica y como ella trabaja poco a poco en su sueño quiere comprar mas herramientas de trabajo para mejorar el servicio, como esmalte para maquillar las uñas, e implementos para organizarlas, adicional a esto quiere comprar una maquina de masajes para pies, pero ella no cuenta con el capital para hacer esas compras por lo que solicita un préstamo que le permita seguir progresando, mejorando el servicio y dejando clientes satisfechos, así sus ingresos se irán incrementando y su calidad de vida mejorará notablemente.
texts.en: At 28 years old and a mother of two, Liseth is an enterprising woman who wakes up every morning with the desire to move her children ahead in life.  She works from home providing manicures and pedicures to her neighbors and acquaintances.  She has been doing this work for the last eight years, and feels lucky to have a business where she can also take care of her children.  She dreams of having a beauty salon to provide her with more financial stability, and as she is working little by little towards her dream, she would like to buy more work-tools to improve her service; for example, nail varnishes, and means of organizing them.  She would also like to buy a foot-massage machine but she doesn't have the capital to make these purchases.  This is why she is requesting a loan which will allow her to continue to make progress, improve her service, and keep her customers satisfied.  Her income will also grow, and her quality of life will improve noticeably.

loans.use: to buy work-tools and a foot-massage machine.

loans.name: Cacio

texts.es: Cacio tiene 41 años, esta casado con Edilberta de 43 años, con quien tiene 04 hijos. Juntos habitan en su casa que es propia,  ubicada en la comunidad de Nueva Fortaleza, Pichari. Nació amando la naturaleza, caracteristica que lo llevó a dedicarse a la agricultura durante mucho tiempo, es así que continúa cultivando cacao y café, productos que tiene mucha demanda en el mercado nacional e internacional. Dichos productos son llevados a los centros acopiadores de granos, que por cada kilo que vende recibe buena paga, eso lo ayudo mucho para sostener económicamente a su familia. Entonces día a día, desde muy temprano cuida de sus cafetales y del cacao, sin embargo solo no puede con tanto trabajo, por lo que debe contratar jornaleros para que se encarguen de la limpieza y extracción de los granos. Este será su primer crédito con MFP, por el que se compromete en cancelar puntualmente el pago de sus cuotas. Con los 1.000 nuevos soles, lo invertirá para contratar jornaleros que lo ayuden a limpiar sus plantas de café y cacao.
texts.en:
Cacio is 41 years old.  He is married to 43-year-old Edilberta and the couple have four children.  They live together in their own home which is located in Nueva Fortaleza community, in Pichari.

Cacio was born loving nature.  This led him to work in agriculture for a long time.  He continues farming, growing cacao and coffee, products which are in great demand in both national and international markets.  These products are taken to storage warehouses where he receives good money for every kilo that he sells.  This helps Cacio to financially support his family.  Day by day, from very early in the morning, he cares for his coffee and cacao plantations.  However, he is not able to do all this work on his own so he must hire laborers who take care of weeding and picking the beans.

This will be Cacio's first loan from MFP and he pledges to make his loan repayments on time.  He will invest his 1,000 soles in hiring laborers to help him weed his coffee and cacao plants.

loans.use: to hire laborers

loans.name: Cipriana

texts.es: Cipriana tiene 37 años, esta casada con Teodoro de 37 años, con quien tiene 04 hijos. Juntos habitan en su casa propia, ubicada en la comunidad de Nueva Fortaleza, Pichari. Ella desde muy joven se dedicaba a trabajar en el cultivo y cosecha de cacao, aunque no eran producciones propias, pero siempre anhelaba tenerlo. Y con el pequeño sueldo que percibía logró ahorrarlo, hoy cultiva y comercializa sus propios productos, como el café y el cacao. Reconoce que si no fuera por todos estos años de trabajo y de enseñanza que le proporcionaron su familia, nunca hibiera logrado lo que hasta ahora tiene. El tener productos de calidad, es una muestra de lo mucho que aprendió y sus compradores más potenciales se sienten satisfechos. En ocasiones sus hijos la apoyan, pero cuando es temporada de cosecha, debe contratar jornaleros para que se encarguen de éste arduo trabajo. Este será su Primer crédito con MFP, por lo que se compromete en realizar puntualmente el pago de sus cuotas. Con los 1,000 nuevos soles que solicita, comprará fertilizantes para fertilizar su campo agrícola.
texts.en:
Cipriana is 37 years old and married to 37-year-old Teodoro.  The couple have four children and live together in their own home, which is located in Nueva Fortaleza community, in Pichari.

Cipriana has been growing and harvesting cacao since she was very young even though, back then, she wasn't growing her own crops.  However, she always longed to have her own.  With the small salary that she earned, she managed to save up and now she grows and sells her own produce such as coffee and cacao.  She acknowledges that if it weren't for all the years of work and education that her family gave her, she would never have managed to achieve what she has up to now.  Having top-quality produce is a sign of how much she learned and her buyers are satisfied.  Sometimes her children support her in her work but, at harvest time, she must hire laborers to take care of this hard work.  

This will be Cipriana's first loan from MFP and she pledges to make her loan repayments on time.  She will use her 1,000 soles to buy fertilizers so that she can fertilize her farmland.

loans.use: to buy sacks of fertilizer

loans.name: John De Jesus

texts.es:
Jhon de Jesús tiene un negocio donde le ofrece a sus clientes mecato y gaseosa, allí tiene una mesas de billar, una cancha de fútbol y una piscina deteriorada.

Su sueño es poder hacer de su negocio un espacio recreativo para la zona y para iniciar quiere restaurar la piscina y las mesas de billar, además así podrá ofrecer mas productos comestibles.

Al iniciar estas nuevas atracciones en su negocio podrá mejorar sus ingresos para poder darle a su hijo recién nacido una buena calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Jhon de Jesús has a business selling packed lunches and soda.  In the same location, he also has pool tables, a soccer pitch and a swimming pool which is in a bad state of repair.

Jhon de Jesús' dream is to turn his business into a recreational space for the area.  To start off with, he would like to restore the swimming pool and the pool tables.  He would also like to be able to sell more food products.

By starting to provide these new attractions as part of his business, he will be able to improve his income and provide his newborn son with a good quality of life.

loans.use: to build a swimming pool

loans.name: Demetrius

texts.en:
Demetrius and his wife, Joy, opened Avenue Stop Café and Wings, a convenience store and restaurant, about a month ago. The café offers a variety of tasty foods made to order in the full kitchen in the back, as well as all the products you would find in a neighborhood corner store. An entrepreneur at heart, Demetrius wanted to develop a business that was enjoyable, sustainable, and necessary for the community. In his opinion, nothing is more vital than the food you put into your body. Demetrius enjoys being an entrepreneur and business owner because he is able to employ worthy individuals who otherwise may not have been able to get jobs due to disabilities or other disadvantages. He sees his business as an opportunity to help and be helped by his neighbors, friends, and family. Moreover, Demetrius believes his business will be a great asset to the Tremé area of New Orleans. “This is the heartbeat of New Orleans, this area,” said Demetrius. Joy added that Avenue Stop will be along the path of many Mardis Gras and “Second Line” brass band parades.

Demetrius has long been a figure in the Tremé community. For fifteen years he had a fine clothing store in the Avenue Stop building, but during Hurricane Katrina the store was looted and he was forced to shut it down. He worked for a while as a mattress salesmen in a nearby store, but he always dreamed of opening another business of his own.

Demetrius hopes to one day expand Avenue Stop Café and Wings. “We should have named this business Avenue First Stop, because this is just stop number one. We’re going to keep going and help New Orleans to grow and redevelop,” he said. He also hopes that as the business grows, Joy will be able to cut back her hours as a hotel guest services representative and use her skills as a gourmet cook to expand the menu of the café and create more complex dishes. 

Demetrius will use his Kiva loan to purchase equipment such as a deep fryer, a grease filtering system, and pots and pans.

loans.use: to purchase a deep fryer, grease filtering system, and other equipment

loans.name: Carlos Livigton

texts.es:
Carlos Livington tiene 43 años de edad es soltero no tiene hijos, vive con los padres en el Cantón Chillanes Provincia de Bolívar.

La VRC Unión y Progreso la Colombia baja, esta conformada por quince integrantes y esta ubicada a 90 minutos de la cooperativa esta ventanilla se dedica a Actividades Agrícolas, siembra de cacao, arroz, maíz,Soya plátano, naranja, etc.

Carlos se dedica a la agricultura, tiene cultivos de cacao arroz, maíz, soya, naranja, las compras y las ventas lo realiza en San José del Tambo cada fin de semana .
Solicita el crédito para poder comprar semillas, abonos e insumos para los cultivos y tambien invertir en la compra de cerdos para la cria y luego venderlos.

Con la ayuda del prestamo le ayudará a suplir necesidades económicas, Enfrenta desafios que son muy frecuentes como la competencia y las plagas.

El sueño es poderse comprar una casa y más hectareas e terreno para aumnetar los cultivos y tambien los ingresos.
En los tiempos libres le gusta salir de paseo con los padres para que puedan distraerse.
texts.en:
Carlos Livington is 43 years old.  He is single and doesn't have any children.  He lives with his parents in Chillanes canton, in Bolívar province.

The 'Unión y Progreso la Colombia Baja' community bank has fifteen members and is located 90 minutes from our cooperative.  The members of this bank work in agriculture.  They grow cacao, rice, corn, soy, bananas, oranges, etc.

Carlos is a farmer who grows cacao, rice, corn, soy and oranges.  He makes both his purchases and his sales in San José del Tambo every weekend.

Carlos is requesting this loan to buy seeds, manure and supplies for his crops.  He will also invest in buying pigs to raise and then sell.

The support of this loan will help Carlos to financially cover his needs.  He faces very frequent challenges such as competition and pests.

Carlos' dream is to be able to buy a house and more hectares of land so that he can increase the amount of crops he grows and also his income.  In his free time, he enjoys going out for walks with his parents so that they can enjoy themselves.

loans.use: to buy seeds, manure and supplies for his crops, and to buy pigs to raise and sell

loans.name: Luis Alberto

texts.es:
El Señor Luis está casado con la señora lidia, ellos son de la ciudad de Encarnación. Él tiene un puesto de venta de juguetes en el circuito comercial.
El cliente es comerciante con más de 12  años de antigüedad en su profesión. El nos comenta que viaja a Buenos Aires para traer los productos que vende y gracias a esto le sale un poco mas barato el costo de sus productos. Dice también que gracias a esta actividad el puede solventar cualquier gasto e imprevisto que se le pudiera presentar.
El solicita el crédito para la compra de juguetes de toda variedad, con lo cual podrá tener mayor variedad del mismo. Agradece a la Fundación por la confianza que le brinda, pues él ya es cliente recurrente de la institución.
texts.en:
Luis is married with Lidia and they come from the town of Encarnación. He runs a stall in the shopping circuit where he sells toys.
He has been a trader for more than 12 years. He tells us he travels to Buenos Aires to buy the products he sells, and thanks to this his products cost him a bit less. He also says that thanks to this activity he is able to pay for any expenses and contingencies that he might have to face.
He is requesting a loan to buy different types of toys, helping him to offer a better variety of items. He is grateful to the Fundacíon Paraguaya for the confidence he has been shown, as he is a recurrent customer of the institution.

loans.use: To buy toys to sell.

loans.name: Oliva

texts.es:
Olivia, una emprendedora oriunda de la ciudad de Medellín es una mujer que con gran esfuerzo ha logrado salir adelante y conseguir lo básico para sobrevivir. Con una energía inagotable pues, soltera, madre de 1 hijo y con la necesidad de generar ingresos, decidió comenzar su propio negocio, Olivia confecciona pijamas, vestidos y ropa en general, y aunque su jornada laboral es extenuante, se siente feliz de trabajar y valerse por si misma, así como prestarle un servicio a la comunidad y de generar empleos indirectos.

Olivia espera seguir confeccionando sus prendas y para ello necesita de un préstamo con el cual comprar insumos como telas hilos, y materia prima en general para la próxima colección, con el fin de ampliar su clientela, sacar más producción y proporcionalmente incrementar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Olivia is an entrepreneur from the city of Medellín.  She is a woman who has managed to move ahead in life through great effort, and achieve the basics for 
survival.  She has an inexhaustible energy, and as she is single with a son and needed to earn money, she decided to start her own business.  Olivia sews pajamas, dresses and clothes in general, and although her daily work is strenuous, she feels happy to be working and makes the most of it, providing service to the community and generating indirect employment.

Olivia hopes to continue sewing her items, and to do this she needs a loan with which to buy supplies such as fabric, thread, and raw materials in general for her next collection.  Her end goal is to grow her customer base, grow her production, and correspondingly increase her income.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for her next clothing collection.

loans.name: Leibert Isidro

texts.es:
Leibert Isidro tiene 32 años de edad es soltero no tiene hijos, vive con los padres en el Cantón Chillanes Provincia de Bolívar.

 La VRC Unión y Progreso la Colombia baja, esta conformada por quince integrantes y está ubicada a 90 minutos de la cooperativa esta ventanilla se dedica a Actividades Agrícolas, siembra de cacao, arroz, maíz, Soya plátano, naranja, etc. 

Leibert se dedica a la agricultura, tiene cultivos de cacao arroz, maíz, soya, plátano, las compras y las ventas lo realiza en San José del Tambo cada fin de semana.

 Solicita el crédito para comprar semillas, abonos e insumos agrícolas para mantener en buenas condiciones los cultivos. 
Con la ayuda del préstamo le ayudará a suplir necesidades económicas, Enfrenta desafíos que son muy frecuentes como la competencia y las plagas. 
El sueño es poderse comprar más hectáreas e terreno para aumentar la siembra y poder incrementar los ingresos. 
En los tiempos libres le gusta practicar el deporte en especial el bolibol.
texts.en:
Leibert Isidro is 32 years old, single, and doesn't have any children.  He lives with his parents in Chillanes canton, in Bolívar province.

The 'Unión y Progreso la Colombia Baja' community bank has fifteen members and is located 90 minutes from our cooperative.  The members of this bank work in agriculture, growing cacao, rice, corn, soy, bananas, oranges, etc.

Leibert is a farmer who grows cacao, rice, corn, soy and bananas.  He makes both his purchases and sales in San José del Tambo every weekend.

Leibert is requesting this loan to buy seeds, manure and agricultural supplies to keep his crops in good condition.

The support of this loan will help Leibert to financially cover his needs.  He faces very frequent challenges such as competition and pests.

Leibert's dream is to buy more hectares of land so that he can increase the amount of crops he grows and also his income.  In his free time, he enjoys taking part in sports, especially volleyball.

loans.use: to buy seeds, manure and agricultural supplies to keep his crops in good condition

loans.name: Amanda De Jesus

texts.es:
Doña Amada es una mujer de 60 años que se ha dedicado toda su vida a la cría y venta de pollos y gallinas y con este negocio a podido sostener su familia, ella además trabaja como empleada doméstica.

Ella quiere tener mas animales para la venta ya sí su negocio crece y podría dejar de trabajar como empleada, además se siente cansada y ya quiere solo dedicarse a su negocio y familia.
texts.en:
Amanda is a 60-year-old woman who has spent her whole life raising and selling chickens and hens.  Through this business, she has been able to support her family.  She also works as a maid.

Amanda would like to have more animals to sell so that her business will grow and she will be able to stop working as a maid.  She feels tired and, from now on, would like to be able to devote herself to this business and her family.

loans.use: to buy chickens

loans.name: Jaime

texts.es:
El cliente, Jaime vive hace 7 años con su hijo, que  tiene 13 años, donde la madre les dejo y se fue con otro hombre, tiempo que el cliente se hizo cargo del niño donde ambos tenían una vida buena y feliz. después de 7 años la madre vuelve y pide la custodia del niño, donde el hijo por todo el tiempo que paso ya no recuerda a su madre no lo quiere ver y él hijo esta muy acostumbrado a su padre, fueron a un juicio por la custodia del niño donde el Juez determino hace unos días atrás a favor del padre, donde el cliente demuestra la felicidad absoluta por el resultado, después de vivir momentos de presión, incertidumbre por las cosas que paso y sobre todo el temor de perder a su único hijo. 

El destino del crédito es para refaccionar su vivienda,  actualmente a la fecha se inicio el tramite de divorcio donde el cliente presenta la documentación respectiva, al final padre e hijo vuelven a tener la vida de antes llena de felicidad. el cliente tiene un objetivo principal a futuro es de ver a su hijo todo un profesional, el cliente vive en la zona de pacata alta, urbanización 10 de diciembre.
texts.en:
Our client, Jaime, has been living with his 13-year-old son for 7 years, since the boy's mother left them and ran off with another man.  Over the years, Jaime has taken care of the boy and they have both enjoyed a good and happy life together.  After seven years, the boy's mother returned and demanded custody of him.  Their son, owing to the length of time that had passed, no longer remembered his mother, didn't want to see her and was more used to his father.  They went to court to fight for custody of the child and, a few days ago, the Judge ruled in favor of the father.  Our client is absolutely overjoyed with the result after having lived through times of pressure and uncertainty over what would happen, and, above all, having been in fear of losing his only son.

Jaime will use this loan to refurbish his home.  Jaime has begun divorce proceedings and is presenting the relevant documentation.  In the end, father and son have returned to living the happy life they led before.  Our client has a clear goal for the future which is to see his son become a professional.  Jaime lives in Pacata Alta district, on the '10 de Diciembre' estate.

loans.use: to refurbish his home

loans.name: Yamile

texts.es:
Yamile desde hace 5 años tiene un negocio de venta de mercancía al detal y por catálogo, ella se siente muy feliz porque puede manejar su tiempo además de poder estar mucho tiempo con pequeño hijo de 3 años.

Ella quiere que su negocio crezca y así poder mejora su economía para brindarle a su hijo cada día una mejor calidad de vida.

Su sueño es tener un local bien surtido de productos para tener buena clientela y con variedad de productos.
texts.en:
For the last five years, Yamile has had a business selling merchandise at retail and from catalogs.  She feels very happy, because she is able to manage her time and additionally she gets a lot of time to spend with her three-year-old son.

She wants her business to grow so that she can improve her financial situation, and provide her son with a better quality of life on a daily basis.

Her dream is to have her own premises and keep them well-stocked with products, so that she can have a good customer base and offer a variety of products.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Felipe

texts.es: Felipe tiene 58 años, esta casado con Isabel de 58 años, con quien tiene 1 hijo. Juntos habitan en su casa propia ubicada en la comunidad de Nueva Fortaleza, Pichari. Él se considera una persona con mucho proyectos en mente, entre ellas la de cultivar cacao y tiempo despúes logro hacerlo con el café. Esto no hibiera sido posible sin la ayuda de su esposa, y al cabo de un tiempo empezó con la comercialización. Hoy su trabajo se ha intensificado, pues los granos que produce tiene mucha demanda a nivel nacional e internacional. Sin embargo, le falta más cosas y proyectos por realizar, por ello trabaja duro, desde muy temprano se levanta para fertilizar sus tierras y aprovechar los beneficios que le brinda, obteniendo así granos de calidad. Este será su primer crédito con MFP, por el cual espera el apoyo de cada uno de ustedes para continuar desarrollando su trabajo. Con los 1.000 soles que solicita, contratará jornaleros para que se encarguen de la limpieza de sus cafetales.
texts.en:
Felipe is 58 years old.  He is married to Isabel, aged 58, with whom he has one son.  They live in their own house, which is located in the community of Nueva Fortaleza, in Pichari. 

He considers himself to be a person with many projects, including farming cocoa, and at a later point he added coffee.  This wouldn't have been possible without the support of his wife.  After a while he began to market his crops, and today his work has intensified, as there is great demand for the crops he grows on a national and international level.  Having said that, he lacks many things and still has other plans he wants to achieve.  For this reason, he works hard, getting up very early to fertilize the fields and take advantage of the benefits they bring, thereby obtaining good crops.

This will be his first loan with MFP, which is why he is hoping for the support of each one of you to be able to continue developing his business.  

With the 1,000 Soles that he is requesting, he will hire workers to take care of clearing up his coffee plantation.

loans.use: to hire workers.

loans.name: La Esperanza Group

texts.es:
La formación del presente comité se inició gracias a una D. las miembros. Ella contacto con sus vecinas y amigas para formar el comité en su Barrio. El comité se Denomina “La Esperanza” en homenaje a la oportunidad que le brinda la Fundación  Paraguaya; ya que las mismas señoras tendrán nuevas oportunidades para emprender un mejor trabajo, colaborando con los ingreso D. su hogar y así brindarle a sus hijos un mejor bienestar. Actualmente están en el décimo ciclo con 18 integrantes.
La Directora General del comité es la Sra. María, ella se dedica a la venta D. ropas y cosméticos en su barrio, es una persona, responsable, y trabajadora.  Comenta que gracias a su trabajo ha logrado mantener a su familia y darle por lo menos las condiciones básicas para que puedan tener una vida digna y decorosa.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra D. prendas, con lo cual podré cumplir con la demanda D. sus clientes. Agradece a la Fundación por la nueva oportunidad que le da.
texts.en:
This committee was created thanks to the initiative of one of its members, who invited her neighbors and friends to start a committee in her neighborhood. The name chosen for this committee is “La Esperanza” (“Hope”) in honor of the opportunities offered by Fundación Paraguaya, as these ladies will have new chances to star a better job, thus contributing to the income of their families and proving their children with a better standard of living. The group is composed of 18 members and they are actually working their tenth cycle. 
María is the Director General of this committee. She engages in selling clothes and cosmetics in her neighborhood. She is a responsible and hardworking woman. She says that thanks to her job she has succeeded in providing for her family and in offering them at least the basic conditions for a decent and honorable life.
She is requesting a loan to buy items of clothing, in order to meet her customers’ requests. She is grateful to Fundación Paraguaya for the new chance she is being offered.

loans.use: To buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: Compromiso Y Lealtad Group

texts.es:
Éste Banco comunal se llama “Compromiso y Lealtad” lo conforman 20 emprendedores quienes se dedican a diferentes rubros entre los cuales se encuentran venta de ropa, zapatos, artículos de aseo, gL. con helio, pollos asados, juguetes inflables para niños, ropa usada, herramientas, servicios de instalación de vidrios, repostería, artesanía en tejido, entre otros. Todos ellos pertenecientes a la comuna de Conchalí. 
Jessica integrante del Banco comunal, quien en la foto se encuentra en la segunda fila, ubicada en el segundo lugar de izquierda a derecha, vistiendo un sweater color negro y sosteniendo una carpeta de Fondo Esperanza en sus manos. Se dedica a la compra, reparación y venta de zapatos desde hace 11 años. Su trabajo consiste en comprar zapatos viejos o en desuso principalmente en ferias libres y luego restaurarlos y dejarlos como nuevos, para posteriormente venderlos. Oficio que le enseñó su padre. Ella vende en un persa, en un puesto con patente que le cedió su padre. 
Comenta que desde sus inicios le ha ido muy bien con el negocio, conserva clientela antigua por lo tanto también es fija. Jessica trabaja los días viernes y fines de semana. 
Su mercadería la compra en un sector llamado “Victoria”, ubicado en la ciudad de Santiago, ahí venden cueros, hilos, entre otros.
Con el crédito comprará zapatos. 
Sus metas en su negocio son comprar una camioneta para trasladar su mercadería. 
Jessica vive junto a su marido y sus dos hijas de 15 y 7 años de edad, sus sueños son costear los estudios superiores de sus hijas para que algún día, sean profesionales. 
Ella está muy contenta y agradecida de los servicios brindados por Fondo Esperanza, ya que le permitirá invertir en su negocio. Respecto al grupo dice tener muy buenas relaciones interpersonales con las demás emprendedoras. Además tiene muy buenas expectativas de las capacitaciones. Respecto a la socia que aparece en el recuadro superior izquierdo, debió ausentarse el día de la fotografia por motivos personales. 
Conchalí es una comuna de la región metropolitana (donde está Santiago, capital de Chile)  ubicada hacia el norte de la misma. Posee un barrio industrial delimitado, y múltiples actividades económicas y comerciales de pequeño tamaño, incluyendo ferias libres, talleres artesanales, garajes, terminales de buses, entre otros. El sector microempresarial es muy relevante en su actividad comercial.
texts.en:
This community bank is called “Compromiso y Lealtad” ('Commitment and Loyalty").  It is made up of 20 entrepreneurs who work in different fields, including selling clothes, shoes, cleaning items, helium balloons, roast chicken, inflatable toys for children, used clothes, tools; and services installing windows, confectionery, woven handicrafts, and other things.  They all live in the community of Conchalí.
 
Jessica is a member of the communal bank, who is in the second row of the photo, second from the left.  She is wearing a black sweater and holding a Fondo Esperanza folder.  She has been working buying, repairing and selling shoes for the last eleven years.  Her work consists of buying old or no longer used shoes, mainly at the markets, which she then repairs and makes like new, so she can sell them later on.  She learned this trade from her father.  She sells at a stall in a bazaar with a permit, which her father transferred to her.

She comments that her business has been going well for her since the start; she holds on to her old customers as they are loyal.  Jessica works Fridays and weekends.

She buys her merchandise in the Victoria neighborhood of Santiago city, where they sell leather and thread among other things.  She will buy shoes with the loan.

Her goals for her business are to buy a van for transporting her merchandise.
 
Jessica lives with her husband and two daughters, aged 15 and 7.  Her dreams are to pay for high-school education for her daughters so that they can one day become professionals.

She is very happy about the services provided by Fondo Esperanza and grateful for them, as they allow her to invest in her business.  In terms of the group, she has very good interpersonal relationships with the other entrepreneurs.  She also has very high expectations of the trainings. The member who appears in the upper left hand corner had to be absent the day the photo was taken for personal reasons. 

Conchalí is a community in the metropolitan region of Santigao, the capital of Chile, and is located in the northern part of that region.  It has a demarcated industrial neighborhood, and many small-sized economic and commercial activities including open markets, craft workshops, parking garages, bus terminals, among other things.  The micro-enterprise sector is very relevant with its commercial activity.

loans.use: to buy shoes.

loans.name: Adela

texts.es:
Adela es socia del Banco Comunal “Medallitas de Oro II”, ubicado en el distrito de Puno, provincia y departamento de Puno, tiene 28 años de edad, es conviviente y tiene dos hijos, tiene estudios de educación secundaria.
Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela R. desde hace dos ciclos, su primer préstamo fue por la suma de S/. 300.00 nuevo soles, dinero que invirtió en su carro, ella realiza servicio de transporte.
Ahora solicitará un nuevo préstamo por la suma de S/. 800.00 nuevo soles, dinero que utilizará para comprar asientos para su auto, ella trabaja junto con su esposo.
Su sueño es tener una empresa de transportes con muchas unidades, esto le generaría muchos más ingresos.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es la puntualidad, responsabilidad y las charlas.
texts.en:
Adela is a member of the “Medallitas de Oro II” community bank which is located in Puno district, in Puno province and department.  She is 28 years old, lives with her partner, and has two children.  She studied at high school.

Adela has been working with Movimiento Manuela R. for two loan cycles.  Her first loan was for 300 soles and she invested that money in her car (she provides a transport service).

Adela is now requesting a new loan for 800 soles which she will use to buy seats for her car.  She works together with her husband.

Adela's dream is to own a transport company with many vehicles.  This would make her a lot more income.

What Adela likes about her community bank is the punctuality, the responsibility and the talks.

loans.use: to buy seats for her car

loans.name: Aida Emma

texts.es:
Aida aprendio esta actividad hace 10 años pero la paralizo por trabajar en una empresa atunera y ahora con tres hijos ya no puede estar en el empresa retorno su actividad hace 4 años con lo que ahora esta trabajando.
Labora de lunes a sabado de 8:30am hasta las 7:00pm y se dedica la Produccion No tiene ninguna dificultad en su trabajo La Sra Aida  esta casada y su esposo se dedica a la pesca y tienen 3 hijos Con el prestamo va comprar una maquina de coser. Unas de sus metas para el futuro es incrementar su negocio
texts.en:
Aida learned this business ten years ago but she stopped working in it in order to work for a tuna company.  Now, with her three children, she can no longer work for the company and so she has returned to her sewing business.  She has been working in the sewing business for four years now.

Aida works from Monday to Saturday, from 8.30am to 7.00pm.  She works in production.  She doesn't have any problems with her work.  Aida is married and her husband is a fisherman.  They have three children.  Aida will use her loan to buy a sewing machine.  One of her goals for the future is to increase the size of her business.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine

loans.name: Marianne Noemy

texts.es:
La sra Marianne Noemy tiene 24 años vive en el departamento de La Paz , comenzó a trabajar con esta actividad
después de salir Bachiller a los 18 años en el comercio de productos de Joyería y Bisutería
vendiendo collares, aretes, pulseras, adornos para celular , pero también le llamo la atención
poder hacer, crear y diseñar estas joyas para poder obtener un poco más de ingresos es por eso
que de manera paulatina está creando algunos productos.

Marianne se independizo a los 20 años, vive actualmente en casa de sus papas pero ella
genera ingresos para pagar sus gastos , los pocos ahorros que pudo guardar los invirtió en sus
inscripciones universitarias.

El crédito que solicita es para la compra de mercadería para negocio , para así poder salir adelante
y lograr lo que tanto sueña en la vida una casa propia.
texts.en:
Marianne Noemy is 24 years old and lives in La Paz department.  She started working in this business after finishing high school at the age of 18.  Marianne sells jewelry and costume jewelry such as necklaces, earrings and bracelets.  She also sells cell phone decorations.  She was drawn by the idea of making, creating and designing pieces of jewelry in order to make a little more income.  For this reason, she is gradually creating some products herself.

Marianne became independent at the age of 20.  She currently lives in her parents' home but she makes income in order to cover her expenses.  She invested the small amount of savings she was able to make in paying her university registration fees.

Marianne will use the loan that she is requesting to buy merchandise for her business so that she can get ahead and obtain what she dreams of in life: a house of her own.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her jewelry business

loans.name: Eusebia

texts.es:
Eusebia es socia del Banco Comunal “Medallitas de Oro II”, ubicado en el distrito de Puno, provincia y departamento de Puno, tiene 52 años de edad, está casada y tiene dos hijos independientes.  Estudió solo hasta 3ro de educación primaria.
Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace  cinco años, su primer préstamo fue por la suma de S/. 300.00 nuevo soles, dinero que invirtió en su negocio de venta de abarrotes, golosinas y gaseosas.
Solicitará un nuevo préstamo por la suma de S/.  3000.00 nuevo soles, préstamo que invertirá en la compra de gaseosas, arroz, azúcar, galletas y otros insumos más.  En el negocio le ayuda su hija y esposo, éste último trabaja en el hospital.
Su sueño es vender frazadas y colchones al por mayor.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es la puntualidad, la responsabilidad y la comprensión entre las socias.
texts.en:
Eusebia is a member of the Medallitas de Oro II communal bank, located in the district of Puno, province and department of Puno.  She is 52 years old and married, with two children who live on their own.  She studied only through the third grade.

She has been working with the Manuela Ramos Movement for five years.  Her first loan was for the sum of 300 PEN, which she invested in her business selling groceries, candy, and soda.

She will request a new loan for the sum of 3,000 PEN, which she will use to buy soda, rice, sugar, cookies, and other supplies.  Her daughter and her husband help her in the business.  Her husband works in a hospital.

Her dream is to sell blankets and mattresses wholesale.

What she likes about the communal bank is the punctuality, the responsibility, and the understanding among the members.

loans.use: to buy soda, rice, sugar, cookies, and other supplies.

loans.name: Hever

texts.es: Hever tiene 34 años, convive con Maribel de 28 años, con quien tiene 04 hijos. Juntos habitan en su casa propia, ubicada en la comunidad de Nueva Fortaleza, Pichari. Él se destaca por ser un hombre emprendedor y talentoso, desde muy joven siempre estuvo interesado en el negocio. Es así que se inicio en la agricultura cultivando y comercializando café y cacao, donde recaudo ganancias y con ese capital, logró comprar y acopiar más cacao, café  palillo y maíz, para así comercializarlos en mayor escala; siendo el café y cacao los que más demanda tiene. Los meses que más producción tiene, son los meses de abril a agosto, es por esta razón que solo acopiara café, pero en pocas cantidades. Por ello es que recurre a solicitar un crédito, para incrementar su capital y así no dejar de vender. Sin embargo, uno de las cosas que también lo perjudica es la demora de pago, pues mayormente son llevados al exterior. Este será su primer crédito con MFP, por lo se compromete en cancelar puntualmente el pago de sus cuotas. Con los 1,000 soles que solicita, comprará más café.
texts.en:
Hever is 34 years old and lives with Maribel, who is 28.  The couple have four children.  They live together in their own home which is located in Nueva Fortaleza community, in Pichari.  Hever stands out as an entrepreneurial and talented man.  He has always been interested in business, since he was very young.  He started working in agriculture, growing and selling coffee and cacao.  He made profits and, with this capital, he managed to buy and stockpile more cacao, coffee, turmeric and corn to sell on a larger scale (coffee and cacao being the crops in most demand).  The most productive months are April to August.  For this reason, he will only stockpile coffee, in small quantities.

Hever is requesting a loan in order to increase his capital so that he doesn't have to stop selling.  One thing that proves detrimental to his business is delays in receiving payment as his crops are mainly sold abroad.

This will be Hever's first loan from MFP and he pledges to make his repayments on time.  He will use the 1,000 soles that he is requesting to buy more coffee.

loans.use: to buy sacks of coffee

loans.name: Elsa Rosa

texts.es:
Elsa es socia del Banco Comunal “Medallitas de Oro II”, ubicado en el distrito de Puno, provincia y departamento de Puno, tiene 30 años de edad, es  conviviente y tiene un hijo, realizó estudios hasta 4to de educación secundaria.
Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace cinco años, su préstamo inicial fue de S/. 300.00 nuevo soles, dinero que invirtió en su negocio de venta de de ferretería.
Con su nuevo préstamo de S/. 3,000.00 nuevo soles, comprará tres paquetes de tubos de agua, desagüe, luz y otros accesorios para el negocio.  Trabaja sola en el negocio, su esposo tiene otro negocio venta de flores.
Su sueño es capitalizarse y llenar el kiosco con mucha más mercadería.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es la alegría y las utilidades del ahorro.
texts.en:
Elsa is a member of the “Medallitas de Oro II” community bank which is located in Puno district, in Puno province and department.  She is 30 years old, lives with her partner, and has one child.  She studied up to the fourth year of her secondary education.

Elsa has been working with Movimiento Manuela Ramos for five years.  Her first loan was for 300 soles and she invested that money in her business selling hardware.

Elsa will use her new loan for 3,000 soles to buy three packets of water pipes, sewer pipes, fluorescent tubes and other accessories for her business.  She works alone in her business as her husband has another business selling flowers.

Elsa's dream is to capitalize her business and fill her stand with a lot more merchandise.

What Elsa most likes about her community bank is the happiness and the money she makes on her savings.

loans.use: to buy three packets of water pipes, sewer pipes, fluorescent tubes, etc.

loans.name: Isabel

texts.es:
Isabel integrante del Banco comunal “Persa Rodoviario” perteneciente a la ciudad de Talca. 
Se dedica al rubro del comercio, vendiendo específicamente ropa para mujer y hombre adolescente. 
En un puesto que tiene ubicado en un persa, con una patente de bazar y paquetería. Trabaja en éste rubro desde hace 15 años. 
Su horario de trabajo es de 10ºº de la mañana a 7ºº de la tarde, a partir del día lunes hasta el día sábado.
Su mercadería la compra en un sector llamado “Patronato” en la ciudad de Santiago. 
Con el crédito comprará mercadería para su negocio, específicamente ropa.
Sus metas son abrir una boutique para vender ropa más exclusiva. 
Isabel vive junto a su marido y sus cuatro hijos de 23, 18, 11 y 9 años de edad, sus hijos mayores estudian en la universidad.
Sus sueños son expandir su negocio, para administrar en un futuro su boutique, para costearle los estudios superiores a sus hijos y también darse un gusto que es viajar por todo el país.  Además le gustaría comprar una cabaña cercana a la playa. 
Isabel está muy contenta y agradecida de los servicios brindados por Fondo Esperanza, ya que le permitirán invertir en su negocio y generar mayores ganancias. 
Comenta además que tiene una muy buena relación con el grupo del Banco comunal. 
Talca pertenece a la región del Maule, ubicada en la zona centro del país. Constituye el centro administrativo, económico y cultural de la región, siendo la ciudad más importante del Valle Central chileno. Sobre Talca existe una curiosa referencia en Chile, la frase "Talca, París, y Londres". Entre los mitos al respecto, algunos dicen que es una derivación de la originalmente dicha por un inglés "Talca parece Londres", por la abundante neblina que cubre frecuentemente la ciudad en la temporada invernal, a semejanza de la capital del Reino Unido.
texts.en:
Isabel is a member of the Persa Rodoviario Communal Bank in the city of Talca.  She works in commerce, specifically selling clothing for teenage women and men in a stand located in a street market, where she has a membership with the bazaar and packaging association.  She has been working in this business for 15 years.  Her work schedule is from 10 in the morning until 7 in the evening, Monday through Saturday.  She buys her merchandise in the Patronato section of the city of Santiago.

With the loan she will buy merchandise for her business, specifically clothing.

Her goals are to open a boutique to sell more exclusive clothing.

Isabel lives with her husband and four children, ages 23, 18, 11, and 9.  Her older children are in college.

Her dreams are to expand her business in order to manage her future boutique, pay for her children's college education, and also give herself one wish, which is to travel throughout the entire country.  She would also like to buy a cottage near the beach.

Isabel is very happy and grateful for the services offered by Fondo Esperanza, since they will allow her to invest in her business and generate bigger profits.  She also comments that she has a very good relationship with the communal bank group.

Talca is in the Maule region, located in the central part of the country.  It is the administrative, economic, and cultural center of the region, being the most important city in the Central Valley of Chile.  There is a curious allusion to Talca in Chile, the expression "Talca, Paris, and London."  Among the many myths about the matter, some say that it derives from something an English person once said, "Talca looks like London" [Spanish "parece" 'looks like' and "París" 'Paris' sound alike] because of the abundant fog that frequently covers the city in the winter season, similar to the capital of the United Kingdom.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her business, specifically clothing.

loans.name: Roxana

texts.es:
Roxana es socia del Banco Comunal “Medallitas de Oro II”, ubicado en el distrito de Puno, provincia y departamento de Puno, tiene 29 años de edad, es conviviente y tiene un hijo, cuenta con estudios de educación superior incompleto.
Trabaja desde hace seis ciclos con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos, su primer préstamo fue por la suma de S/. 500.00 nuevo soles, dinero que incrementó al capital de su negocio de venta de ganados ovinos y vacunos.
Con su nuevo préstamo solicitado por la suma de S/. 2000.00 nuevo soles, invertirá en la compra de dos vacas, la señora las compra y vende al instante, trabaja sola en el negocio su esposo trabaja en la mina.
Su sueño es tener una casa, un carro, una tienda y una galería de artefactos.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es la unión, la comprensión y la comunicación entre las socias.
texts.en:
Roxana is a member of the “Medallitas de Oro II” (Little Gold Medals II) communal bank is the Puno district, Puno province and department.  She is 29 years old, and she has a life partner and a son.  She has some college-level coursework.

She has worked with the Movimiento Manuela Ramos for six cycles.  Her first loan was for 500 soles, money that increased her business capital.  She sells sheep and cows.

She will use the requested loan of 2,000 soles to buy two cows.  She buys them and sells them right away.  She works alone in the business, and her husband works in the mine.

Her dream is to have a house, a car, a store, and a handicrafts market.

What she likes about the communal bank is the unity, the understanding, and the communication between the members.

loans.use: to buy two cows.

loans.name: Edilburga

texts.es:
Edilburga es socia del Banco Comunal “Medallitas de Oro II”, ubicado en el distrito de Puno, provincia y departamento de Puno, tiene 36 años de edad, está casada y tiene dos hijos.  Estudió solo hasta la primaria.
La señora es una socia nueva que recientemente ingresa al Movimiento Manuela Ramos, solicitará un préstamo de S/. 500.00 nuevo soles, dinero que incrementará al capital de su negocio, ella se dedica a la venta de ganados vacunos, ovinos y porcinos.  Con éste dinero comprará tres ovejas, la señora cuenta que los animales los compra de Totorani y Tiquillaca, y los  vende al instante aunque a veces los engorda por dos- tres meses.
En el negocio le ayuda su hermana, su esposo trabaja en la mina.
Su sueño es tener un carro para realizar servicio de transporte y mejorar el negocio.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es la facilidad del préstamo.
texts.en:
Edilburga is a member of the “Medallitas de Oro II” community bank which is located in Puno district, in Puno province and department.  She is 36 years old, married, and has two children.  She only completed her primary education.

Edilburga is a new member who recently joined Movimiento Manuela Ramos.  She is requesting a loan for 500 soles to increase her business capital.  Her business is selling cows, sheep and pigs.  She will use this money to buy three sheep.  She tells us that she buys her animals in Totorani and Tiquillaca and sells them right away, though sometimes she fattens them for two or three months.  Her sister helps her in the business.  Her husband works down the mine.

Edilburga's dream is to own a car so that she can provide a transport service and improve her business.  What she likes about her community bank is the ease of the loans.

loans.use: to buy three sheep

loans.name: Eliana

texts.es:
Eliana es socia del Banco Comunal “Medallitas de Oro II”, ubicado en el distrito de Puno, provincia y departamento de Puno, tiene 33 años de edad, es conviviente y tiene dos hijos, realizó estudios de educación superior.
La señora trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace tres ciclos, su primer préstamo fue por la suma de S/. 300.00 nuevo soles, dinero que invirtió en su tienda de abarrotes.  Nos cuenta que también tiene un salón de belleza.
Ahora solicitará un nuevo préstamo por la suma de S/. 1,000.00 nuevo soles, dinero que invertirá en su salón de belleza, comprará líquidos, cuadros y otros accesorios para innovar el local, trabaja sola en el negocio su esposo trabaja fuera de la ciudad de Puno (Bolivia).
Su sueño es ampliar el negocio y abrir otro local para mejorar sus ingresos.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es la unión, la comunicación y la responsabilidad entre las socias.
texts.en:
Eliana is a member of the “Medallitas de Oro II” community bank which is located in Puno district, in Puno province and department.  She is 33 years old, lives with her partner and has two children.  She completed her higher education.

Eliana has been working with Movimiento Manuela Ramos for three loan cycles.  Her first loan was for 300 soles and she invested that money in her grocery store.  She tells us that she also has a beauty salon.

Eliana is now requesting a new loan for 1,000 soles which she will invest in her beauty salon, buying liquids, pictures and other accessories with which to improve her premises.  She works alone in her business.  Her husband works outside of the city of Puno (in Bolivia).  

Eliana's dream is to expand her business and open other premises so that she can improve her income.  What she likes about her community bank is the unity, the communication and the responsibility amongst the members.

loans.use: to buy liquids, pictures and other accessories

loans.name: Irma Susana

texts.es:
Irma es socia del Banco Comunal “Medallitas de Oro II”, ubicado en el distrito de Puno, provincia y departamento de Puno, tiene 38 años de edad, está casada y tiene tres hijos, estudió solo la primaria.
Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace tres años, su primer préstamo fue por la suma de S/. 300.00 nuevo soles, dinero que invirtió en su negocio de compra y venta de animales vacunos y ovinos.  La señora cuenta que también trabaja en la mina de Camana extrayendo oro.
Solicitará un nuevo préstamo por la suma de S/. 1,200.00 nuevo soles, préstamo que invertirá en la compra de maquinarias, comprensora para perforar en la mina y obtener más oro,  trabaja junto con su esposo en la mina y su mamá le ayuda con los animales.
Su sueño es tener más maquinas para trabajar y extraer más oro.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es la conversación y la distracción entre las socias.
texts.en:
Irma is a member of the “Medallitas de Oro II” community bank, which is located in Puno district, in Puno province and department.  She is 38 years old, married, and has three children.  She only completed her primary education.

Irma has been working with Movimiento Manuela Ramos for three years.  Her first loan was for 300 soles and she invested that money in her business buying and selling cows and sheep.  Irma tells us that she also works in the mine in Camana, extracting gold.

Irma is requesting a new loan for 1,200 soles which she will invest in buying machinery: a compressor for drilling in the mine and extracting more gold.  She works with her husband in the mind and her mom helps her with the animals.

Irma's dream is to have more machinery for working and extracting more gold.  What she likes about her community bank are the conversations and the fun that she has with her fellow members.

loans.use: to buy a compressor (machinery)

loans.name: Noemi

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “PRO DESARROLLO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Pisaq, perteneciente a la provincia de Calca,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Noemi; ella tiene 57 años de edad y es casada y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de artesanía, ella vende chompas, pantalones, polos y muñecas, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de artesanías. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar mercadería como pantalones, chompas y llaveros.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Noemi belongs to the "Pro Desarrollo" community bank which is located in Pisaq district, in Calca province, in Cusco department.

Noemi is 57 years old, married, and has two children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her craft business.  Noemi sells sweaters, pants, tops and dolls.  She works from 8.00am to 5.00pm and, through this business, she gets her children ahead in life.  Noemi would like to expand and improve her craft business.  She is requesting this loan to buy merchandise such as pants, sweaters and key chains.

Noemi is happy to be receiving her loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as pants, sweaters and key chains

loans.name: Nancy Piedad

texts.es:
La Señora. Nancy es socia del banco comunal El Cisne, vive por una comunidad alrededor de la parroquia del Valle, esta parroquia esta rodeada de montañas las mismas que nos regalan hermosos paisajes, su gente es muy amable, mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus padres, se dedican al comercio, cría de animales y a la agricultura.

La. Señora. Nancy tiene 36 años, es casada y fruto de su unión conyugal ha concebido 4 hijos de 18, 16, 8 y 6 años de edad, su primera hija es casada e independiente, su segunda hija trabaja y le ayuda económicamente y sus dos últimos hijos están estudiando en una escuelita de la ciudad. Su esposo es labora en una carpintería, la casa en la que viven es de su propiedad.

Doña Nancy es negociante de cerdos hace 10 años y vende solo días de ferias, en su casa se dedica a la cría de cerdos, cuyes y pollos. También labora en la agricultura y lo que cosecha solo para su consumo.
 
En el banco comunal se encuentra hace 10 años y es una de las socias fundadoras de este banco comunal. Este nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de cerdos para continuar con el negocio. 

Su meta es ampliar su negocio y dedicarse a criar más animales.
texts.en:
Nancy is a member of 'El Cisne' (The Swan) community bank.  She lives in a community in El Valle parish.  This parish is surrounded by mountains which provide us with beautiful landscapes.  The people are very kind and they maintain the culture and traditions of their parents.  They work in commerce, raise animals and farm.

Nancy is 36 years old, married, and has four children from her marriage aged 18, 16, 8 and 6.  Her eldest [daughter] is married and lives independently, her second [daughter] works and helps her financially and her two youngest children are attending an elementary school in the city.  Her husband works in a carpentry workshop and they own their own home.

Nancy has been a pig dealer for 10 years and she only sells on market days.  She raises pigs, guinea pigs and chickens at home.  She also farms.  What she harvests is for her family's consumption only.

Nancy has been a member of her community bank for ten years.  She is one of the founding members of the bank.  She will invest this new loan in buying pigs so that she can continue with her business.

Nancy's goal is to expand her business and raise more animals.

loans.use: to buy pigs

loans.name: José Ismael

texts.es:
Don José tiene 30 años de edad, vive con su compañera de vida y sus 2 hijos.

Él se dedica a la crianza de novillos desde hace 8 años, Este trabajo lo aprendió de su padrastro ya que antes solo se dedicaba a trabajar como jornalero. Él se levanta todos los días 5:00 de la mañana a llevar sus animales al terreno para que coman, y debe caminar dos kilómetros para llegar a ese lugar. Luego se regresa a trabajar en labores agrícolas, ya en la tarde vuelve a recoger sus animales y los lleva a su casa.

Don José viaja a una ciudad del oriente del país para adquirir los insumos necesarios para engordar sus novillos. El viaja 10 minutos a pie, luego se traslada en la palangana de una camioneta hasta llegar a un pueblo en donde aborda un autobús que lo conduce hacia la ciudad. Todo el recorrido de ida y vuelta le toma 4 horas.

Actualmente él solicita un préstamo a Fundación Campo para la compra de tres novillos en repasto, ya que por el momento solo tiene dos. El vendió otros dos que tenia para cancelar un préstamo anterior. Con el préstamo también adquirirá las vitaminas y el desparacitante para que los novillos engorden y tengan buena salud. De esta manera podrá vender los animales más rápidamente y recibirá mejores ingresos.

A don  José le interesa asegurar el bienestar de sus hijos, por lo que él ha encontrado la forma de poder trabajar a través de los préstamos. De esta forma el ha podido desarrollar la labor de engorde de novillos, ya que esta es su única fuente de ingresos con la cuenta.

Don José tiene una gran sueña con poder construir una casa de ladrillo para su familia. Actualmente él y su familia viven en una casa que mide 4x4 metros cuadrados, fabricada de lamina de metal y sin habitaciones. Don José también quiere enviar a sus hijos a la escuela.
texts.en:
José is 30 years old, lives with his life partner, and has two children.

José has been raising heifers for eight years.  He learned this work from his stepfather.  Before this he only worked as a farm laborer.  José gets up at 5 o'clock every morning to lead his animals out to his land so that they can eat.  He must walk two kilometers to get there.  He then returns to work on his farming tasks.  In the afternoon, he goes back to fetch his animals and take them home.

José travels to a city in the east of the country to acquire the supplies he needs to fatten his heifers.  He travels for ten minutes on foot then on the bed of a pick-up truck until he arrives at a village where he boards a bus which will drive him to the city.  The round trip takes him four hours.

José is requesting a loan from Fundación Campo so that he can buy three heifers as he currently only has two.  He sold another two which he had in order to repay a previous loan.  He will also use his loan to buy vitamins and anti-parasitic drugs so that his heifers gain weight and enjoy good health.  This means that he will be able to sell the animals more quickly and make more profits.

José is interested in ensuring the well-being of his children.  This is why he has found a way of being able to work with loans and carry out his work fattening heifers.  This is the only source of income he has.

José has a dream of being able to build a house out of bricks for his family.  He and his family currently live in a house that measures 4 x 4 square meters.  It is made from sheets of metal and doesn't have individual rooms.  José would also like to send his children to school.

loans.use: to buy three heifers to fatten

loans.name: Paulina

texts.es:
Paulina es socia del Banco Comunal “Medallitas de Oro II”, ubicado en el distrito de Puno, provincia y departamento de Puno, tiene 34 años de edad, está casada y tiene tres hijos.  Estudió sólo la primaria.
Trabaja desde hace tres años con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos,  con  su préstamo anterior de   S/. 300.00 nuevo soles compró  granos de la región como papa, chuño, también se dedica a la venta de animales como vacunos y ovinos.
Ahora solicitará un nuevo préstamo por las suma de S/. 2000.00 nuevos soles, préstamo que invertirá en la compra de una vaca o una docena de ovejas, los animales los compra en la localidad de Juliaca, Taraco, Acora, todos los sábados y domingos, a veces los carnea y la carne la vende en la ciudad de Puno.  En el negocio trabaja junto con su hermana, su esposo trabaja en la mina.
Su sueño es mejorar el negocio y así incrementar sus ingresos.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal la puntualidad y comunicación con las socias.
texts.en:
